title: Heat advisory issued for today (31)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Meteorology Department had issued a heat index advisory for Western, Northern, North-Central Provinces and Galle and Matara Districts today (31).
The Meteorology Department also cautioned to take steps against the  extreme heat  as well.
